questions.text: While Mitch Rafferty was planting flowers for one of his clients, he got a phone call about his wife Holly being kidnapped. How did the kidnapper let Mitch know he was serious?
questions.correct: Killed a dog walker across the street from Mitch
options: Had a picture of his Holly sent over the camera phone
Shot his best friend standing beside him
Sent Mitch one of his Holly's fingers
questions.explanation:
Killed a dog walker across the street from Mitch.

	Mitch Rafferty was planting flowers for a client when he received a phone call from his Holly's kidnappers. They demanded two million dollars or Holly would be killed. To make sure Mitch knew they were serious, a man across the street who was walking a dog was shot in the head. The man turned out to be Mitch's old roommate and one of Holly's kidnappers.

questions.text: Which room in Mitch's house did the kidnappers bloody to make the police think Mitch killed his wife?
questions.explanation:
Kitchen.

	When Mitch returned home almost two hours after he received the phone call, he found the kitchen ruined and bloodied. When the kidnapper called him, he informed Mitch that the blood was taken from Holly's arm and used to make it seem as if Mitch had killed Holly in the kitchen. If he talked to the police, Holly's dead body would be discovered along with a bloody knife wrapped in one of his T-shirts.

questions.text: How was the kidnapper that Mitch discovered in his garage killed?
questions.correct: He fell and shot himself with his own gun
options: Mitch killed him in self defense
He was killed by one of the other kidnappers
questions.explanation:
He fell and shot himself with his own gun.

	Mitch found surveillance equipment in his garage and also another kidnapper. When they were walking out of the garage, a stack of boxes fell on the kidnapper knocking him over the railing. He fell eight feet and ended up shooting himself with his own gun.

questions.text: When Mitch went to see his older brother, Anson, about Holly's kidnapping, did Anson agree to help Mitch?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The kidnappers told Mitch to go see his brother, Anson. When Mitch arrived and Anson received the phone call from the kidnappers, Anson agreed to help Mitch by giving him the two million dollars. While they were driving to the bank, Anson revealed that he had helped all of his siblings in some financial way except for Mitch because he always seemed self-sufficient.

questions.text: How did Mitch find out that Anson was bad?
questions.correct: He pulled a gun on Mitch
options: One of the kidnappers told Mitch he had been double-crossed
Mitch overheard him talking to the kidnappers
Holly called Mitch and told him
questions.explanation:
He pulled a gun on Mitch.

	When Anson and Mitch went to meet a Anson's friend so they could get some help getting Holly back, Anson pulled a gun on Mitch and revealed that he created the group of men to pull off illegal jobs. In order to get money from Anson, they kidnapped his sister-in-law, however, before Anson sent Mitch to be killed, he revealed that Holly was going to be killed as well.

questions.text: When Mitch went to check on his parents after he killed two hit men trying to kill him, what did he find?
options: Holly was sitting in the living room waiting for him
His parents had moved out without telling him
questions.explanation:
His parents were dead.

	After Mitch's brother, Anson, left him to be killed by two hit men, Mitch returned home to find clues that led him to his parent's house. After arriving at their house, Mitch found his parents, Daniel and Kathy, had been killed with two of his own gardening tools. Both had been killed by Mitch's older brother, Anson.

questions.text: Did Mitch get the two million dollars to give as a ransom for Holly?
questions.explanation:
No.

	With what money Mitch's brother had on hand, Mitch was able to get all but six hundred thousand dollars together for the two million dollar ransom. The kidnapper accepted the money, not letting Mitch know that there was only one kidnapper left.

questions.text: Who told Mitch that Holly was pregnant?
questions.correct: No-one - he found the pregnancy test in the kitchen
questions.explanation:
No-one - he found the pregnancy test in the kitchen.

	Mitch found out Holly was pregnant when he found the pregnancy test kit in the kitchen where she had been kidnapped.

questions.text: Who killed the last of the kidnappers?
questions.explanation:
Mitch.

	After shooting the kidnapper twice in the back, Mitch took Holly and they left the house. Unbeknown to them, the kidnapper had a bullet proof vest on. As he was coming after them on a motorcycle, Mitch shot him in the head, killing him instantly.

questions.text: What happened to Mitch's brother Anson?
options: Mitch let him go with a warning that he never come back
He was killed trying to escape from the police
questions.explanation:
He went to prison.

	Three years after Holly's kidnapping, the newspaper put out a story about one of Anson's clients being killed in prison. Anson had been sentenced to death and was sent to another prison. Holly and Mitch still lived in the same house with their two children, Anthony and Dorothy.
